verses.verse: Now in the twenty <S%H6242><s%> and fourth <S%H702><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> of this month <S%H2320><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> were assembled <S%H622><s%> with fasting <S%H6685><s%>, and with sackclothes <S%H8242><s%>, and earth <S%H127><s%> upon them.

Â¶ Then stood up <S%H6965><s%> upon the stairs <S%H4608><s%>, of the Levites <S%H3881><s%>, Jeshua <S%H3442><s%>, and Bani <S%H1137><s%>, Kadmiel <S%H6934><s%>, Shebaniah <S%H7645><s%>, Bunni <S%H1138><s%>, Sherebiah <S%H8274><s%>, Bani <S%H1137><s%>, and Chenani <S%H3662><s%>, and cried <S%H2199><s%> with a loud <S%H1419><s%> voice <S%H6963><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%> their God <S%H430><s%>.

Thou, even thou, art LORD <S%H3068><s%> alone; thou hast made <S%H6213><s%> heaven <S%H8064><s%>, the heaven <S%H8064><s%> of heavens <S%H8064><s%>, with all their host <S%H6635><s%>, the earth <S%H776><s%>, and all things that are therein, the seas <S%H3220><s%>, and all that is therein, and thou preservest <S%H2421><s%> them all; and the host <S%H6635><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%> worshippeth <S%H7812><s%> thee.

Thou art the LORD <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%>, who didst choose <S%H977><s%> Abram <S%H87><s%>, and broughtest him forth <S%H3318><s%> out of Ur <S%H218><s%> of the Chaldees <S%H3778><s%>, and gavest <S%H7760><s%> him the name <S%H8034><s%> of Abraham <S%H85><s%>;

And foundest <S%H4672><s%> his heart <S%H3824><s%> faithful <S%H539><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thee, and madest <S%H3772><s%> a covenant <S%H1285><s%> with him to give <S%H5414><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%>, the Hittites <S%H2850><s%>, the Amorites <S%H567><s%>, and the Perizzites <S%H6522><s%>, and the Jebusites <S%H2983><s%>, and the Girgashites <S%H1622><s%>, to give <S%H5414><s%> it, I say, to his seed <S%H2233><s%>, and hast performed <S%H6965><s%> thy words <S%H1697><s%>; for thou art righteous <S%H6662><s%>:

And didst see <S%H7200><s%> the affliction <S%H6040><s%> of our fathers <S%H1><s%> in Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, and heardest <S%H8085><s%> their cry <S%H2201><s%> by the Red <S%H5488><s%> sea <S%H3220><s%>;

Thou camest down <S%H3381><s%> also upon mount <S%H2022><s%> Sinai <S%H5514><s%>, and spakest <S%H1696><s%> with them from heaven <S%H8064><s%>, and gavest <S%H5414><s%> them right <S%H3477><s%> judgments <S%H4941><s%>, and true <S%H571><s%> laws <S%H8451><s%>, good <S%H2896><s%> statutes <S%H2706><s%> and commandments <S%H4687><s%>:

And madest known <S%H3045><s%> unto them thy holy <S%H6944><s%> sabbath <S%H7676><s%>, and commandedst <S%H6680><s%> them precepts <S%H4687><s%>, statutes <S%H2706><s%>, and laws <S%H8451><s%>, by the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Moses <S%H4872><s%> thy servant <S%H5650><s%>:

And gavest <S%H5414><s%> them bread <S%H3899><s%> from heaven <S%H8064><s%> for their hunger <S%H7458><s%>, and broughtest forth <S%H3318><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> for them out of the rock <S%H5553><s%> for their thirst <S%H6772><s%>, and promisedst <S%H559><s%> them that they should go in <S%H935><s%> to possess <S%H3423><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> which thou hadst sworn <S%H3027><s%> <S%H5375><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> them.
But they and our fathers <S%H1><s%> dealt proudly <S%H2102><s%>, and hardened <S%H7185><s%> their necks <S%H6203><s%>, and hearkened <S%H8085><s%> not to thy commandments <S%H4687><s%>,

And refused <S%H3985><s%> to obey <S%H8085><s%>, neither were mindful <S%H2142><s%> of thy wonders <S%H6381><s%> that thou didst <S%H6213><s%> among them; but hardened <S%H7185><s%> their necks <S%H6203><s%>, and in their rebellion <S%H4805><s%> appointed <S%H5414><s%> a captain <S%H7218><s%> to return <S%H7725><s%> to their bondage <S%H5659><s%>: but thou art a God <S%H433><s%> ready to pardon <S%H5547><s%>, gracious <S%H2587><s%> and merciful <S%H7349><s%>, slow <S%H750><s%> to anger <S%H639><s%>, and of great <S%H7227><s%> kindness <S%H2617><s%>, and forsookest <S%H5800><s%> them not.

Yea, when they had made <S%H6213><s%> them a molten <S%H4541><s%> calf <S%H5695><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%>, This is thy God <S%H430><s%> that brought thee up <S%H5927><s%> out of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, and had wrought <S%H6213><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> provocations <S%H5007><s%>;

Thou gavest <S%H5414><s%> also thy good <S%H2896><s%> spirit <S%H7307><s%> to instruct <S%H7919><s%> them, and withheldest <S%H4513><s%> not thy manna <S%H4478><s%> from their mouth <S%H6310><s%>, and gavest <S%H5414><s%> them water <S%H4325><s%> for their thirst <S%H6772><s%>.
